website_summaries.verdict: The costume that is arguably most humane for your cat and will make anyone smile.
pros: This costume appeases both the owner and cat with its simple, comfortable design
A great last-minute pick if a cat costume is necessary
cons: Expect the cape to flop to one side or another

customer_reviews.title: Worthless for a larger dog
customer_reviews.text: Purchased an XL to take a 45lb beagle mix trick or treating. Bad idea. The XL was way too small for her, the fit was trrrible, and the tiny pieces of Velcro holding the pizza slice to the body suit were worthless. I had my other dog in a hot dog costume that lasted all night, while the pizza costume barely made it 20 minutes. Don’t waste your money unless you only need it for a few minutes for pics. It also might do better on calm cats.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Coyle

customer_reviews.title: but it fit great on my roommate's cat
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious! A small fits up to a cat about 10 lbs. I have a maine coon, so it was too small for my kitty, but it fit great on my roommate's cat. I'd recommend a medium for a maine coon or any cat up to 20 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: ... a 55lb dog (got the XL) but it fit fine for short term
customer_reviews.text: A little snug for a 55lb dog (got the XL) but it fit fine for short term. The velcro around the neck is crappy and cheap and kept coming off and the costume doesn’t lay well on the back, kept moving sideways. Worked fine for the short time he had it on but pricey for such bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a small for my cat Fit perfectly! Will order again for friends pets!
customer_reviews.author: mely

customer_reviews.title: Very cute for halloween
customer_reviews.text: This fit my 61 lb. Labrabull perfectly. I did not put her arms and legs in the attached "leotard". I strapped it on her, and around her belly and it was just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Annie L.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for us, but not a bad product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good quality product but I’m not sure I would call this a small size. It’s way too big for my adult cat but might be sized correctly for a small dog.
customer_reviews.author: Hayla

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: My dog usually fits in larges but this was tight on him so we had to return. Quality of the costume is great but I'd size up if you have a taller dog
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bell

customer_reviews.title: This pizza is so cute.
customer_reviews.text: This pizza is so cute. My adult cat is a little chubby (about 15 pounds haha) and he fits in this just fine
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: my cat isn’t a fan but I am. she’s 11 pounds. fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: affordable and cute
customer_reviews.text: for the price the costumes is fair. it seems pretty comfortable on my cat though the crust part of the pizza does droop down to once side from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Yazmin

customer_reviews.title: Fit big dog fine.
customer_reviews.text: Big hit for halloween. Everyone was pizza. Fit big dog fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and looked so cute! Easy to put on too
customer_reviews.author: Tyasha P.

customer_reviews.title: Funny!
customer_reviews.text: My cat hates it but I love it. Too funny!
customer_reviews.author: Farrah V.

customer_reviews.title: PizzaCat for the win
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST. My cat is able to move around unhindered. She doesn’t love it, but she’s more annoyed by it than anything. She is PizzaCat
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hach

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Labrador great. The fabric that goes around the stomach and waist is stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Karhlie Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly and doggie happy to wear it for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: Costume was a hit~! Fit perfectly and doggie happy to wear it for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Jean88

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat hates it and scratched me all over when I put it on him. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay on, weak Velcro
customer_reviews.text: Velcro doesn’t stick at ALL. If my dog even thought of moving, it fell off. Cute costume, just doesn’t stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Fit perfectly, I got a small and my Lhasa is 11 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: KLaz

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute costume! Doesn't stay on very well ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute costume! Doesn't stay on very well, but my cat wasn't too agreeable either, haha.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Anderson

customer_reviews.title: but can't walk comfortably because the crust always flops to one side
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Fits well. But it flops to the side. My cat likes costumes, but can't walk comfortably because the crust always flops to one side.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sanford

customer_reviews.title: The pizza crust part is kind of big and awkward ...
customer_reviews.text: The pizza crust part is kind of big and awkward so it makes the costume lean on the side.
customer_reviews.author: EmG

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable and soft! My cat actually kept it on!
customer_reviews.author: Justin J Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my 25lb dog. Should've gotten a ...
customer_reviews.text: Too big for my 25lb dog. Should've gotten a large. It fits my friend so she wore it instead lol.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Costume was great and fit well. Was shipped and arrived extremely fast.
customer_reviews.author: DNAngel

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and comfy for my pup but quality reflects the cheap price
customer_reviews.text: This is hilarious, and my dog actually enjoys wearing it, but the product arrived with the "crust" already oozing fuzz. Keeping it instead of dealing with returning, but probably won't last longer than one hour on halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Beware of sizing and quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute but pretty cheaply made and the sizing is off. I ordered an XL for my 80 pound dog and it's way too small and ripped when I tried to put it on her so I can't return it :(
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Furer

customer_reviews.title: as bad as you would expect
customer_reviews.text: this was fine for pictures but it was clear this had been returned several times before me. i would say this is a pretty non-invasive costume though. my cat hated it but not as much as she could have.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute but the edges look like it was cut out with preschool scissors. Also the it had fur all on it.
customer_reviews.author: Karenza

product_meta.title: Rubie's Costume Company Pizza Slice Pet Suit
product_meta.description: Size:SmallPizza slice pet costume features jumpsuit with the shape of a slice of delicious pizza. IMPORTANT! NOT ALL COSTUMES WILL FIT ALL PETS, consider costume style and animal size; READ THE RUBIE’S PET SIZE CHART and WATCH THE SIZING INSTRUCTION VIDEO, do not select size based on breed. Family-owned, family-focused, and based in the U.S.A. since 1950, Rubie’s is the world’s largest designer and manufacturer of costumes – of course they’d remember your four-legged best friend!
feature_bullets: Pizza slice pet costume features jumpsuit with the shape of a slice of delicious pizza
IMPORTANT! PLEASE READ recent reviews and Q&A's before purchase to determine the best size for your pet; NOT ALL COSTUMES WILL FIT ALL PETS or breeds without adjustment
READ THE RUBIE’S PET SIZE CHART and WATCH THE SIZING INSTRUCTION VIDEO, do not select size based on breed; consider costume style and animal shape before ordering
Search for Rubie's coordinating people costumes, like bacon, banana, berries, burger, condiments, cookie, hot dog, pizza, popcorn, tacos, watermelon and many more for all your group costume needs
Family-owned and based in the U.S.A. since 1950, Rubie's has classic and licensed costumes and accessories for the entire family, of course they'd remember your four-legged best friend
